duties_responsibilities.duty: Track, monitor, validate, expedite, and report real-time part delivery status between Prime Aerospace customers and their supplier base.
Communicate potential shipping delays, identify root causes with suppliers, and establish recovery plans.
Support manufacturing shops to expedite 'On Time' part deliveries to major aerospace production companies.
Create daily status reports and communicate the results with customers and prime aerospace manufacturers.
Develop strong relationships with suppliers and monitor the flow of critical/hot parts through the supplier's manufacturing shop.
Assume responsibility for cutting purchase orders on behalf of the customer, reporting and tracking detailed milestones, and more.

education_certification.credential: Five years' experience working in the manufacturing industry with a strong knowledge of the manufacturing process.

Knowledge of complex machines and processes (grind, deburr, heat treat, lathe, rough machine, finish machine, thread roll, cad plating, chrome plating, prime, passivate, anodize) REQUIRED FOR CONSIDERATION OF THIS POSITION.
Proficient with Microsoft Office Products (understanding of Excel 2010 basic principles are mandatory)
Proven communication skills and detail oriented.
Reliable transportation - must have current/active driver's license and reliable vehicle for driving to suppliers.
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
